text: malāyikāvarunṭa “ādamṭa sujūd karanu” yayi api pævasīma gæna sitā balanu. iblīs hæra, ovun siyallanma sujūd kaḷaha. ohu nam, jinvarungē vargayaṭa ayat keneki. ohu tama deviyangē aṇaṭa venaskam kara hæriyēya. ebævin (minisunē!) oba mā hæra, ohuvada, ohugē paramparāvē daruvanvada, himi vaśayen gannehuda? ovun nam, obaṭa daruṇu saturan vaśayenma siṭinnāha. aparādhakaruvan (māva athæra damā, ovunva tamanṭa ārakṣakayin vaśayen) venas kara gænīma itāmat napuruya
